meanings.definition: By several times; many times over.
meanings.sent1: She improved severalfold after practicing daily.
meanings.sent2: The population of the town increased severalfold in just a few years.
meanings.sent3: His appetite grew severalfold when he smelled the delicious food.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room multiplied severalfold as the concert began.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed severalfold after the rain showered them.
